description: From a hectic day at work to lunch out with friends

Incredibly versatile and available in a range of stunning colors, the designer Bag instantly upgrades your signature style at work, out shopping and anywhere in between.
Strap drop 8, the strap allows you to use the bag as either a hand or shoulder bag that's perfect for travel or everyday use.
